list.abs: Why can we encounter joyless trouble in the life ?, 为什么我们在生活中会遇到不快乐的事?
He lives a joyless life ., 他过着毫无乐趣的生活.
a joyless man ; a joyless occasion ; joyless evenings ., 不快乐的人 ; 不快乐的场合 ; 不愉快的夜晚.
a joyless marriage , childhood , etc., 没有乐趣的婚姻 , 童年等.

auth_sentence.content: The Mediterranean Diet might just as well be called the Monastic Diet or the Joy of Joylessness Diet.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Mediterranean Diet might just as well be called the Monastic Diet or the Joy of Joylessness Diet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Mediterranean Diet might just as well be called the Monastic Diet or the Joy of Joylessness Diet.

auth_sentence.content: There is now, and has always been, a certain joylessness in her bearing.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is now, and has always been, a certain joylessness in her bearing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is now, and has always been, a certain joylessness in her bearing.
